Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th,King Drive,76th,Cottage Grove,and 75th due to,street blockage near 75th/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th,King Drive,76th,Cottage Grove,and 75th due to,street blockage near 75th/Eberhart.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Resuming Normal Routing
ShortDescription: Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, btwn Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown after an earlier reroute.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service is resuming its normal routing, via the subway, between Fullerton & Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains were temporarily rerouted via the elevated lines due to unauthorized person on the tracks at Lake.

Allow extra travel time.
